reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, particularly noting it's not scratchy like some stretch tops, and appreciate its flattering cut that works well for larger busts. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, with one customer highlighting the smocking at the top, and customers like its color, with one describing it as a beautiful rust shade. Customers disagree on the length, with some finding it perfect for various occasions while others say it's too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Good Quality Dress
items.body: This dress is so pretty!! The fabric was really nice, but super comfy. I love the pockets and the Apricot color is super flattering. I am so happy with this purchase. I actually wore it for family pictures. I felt beautiful and the dress looked perfect in the pictures. Read more
items.author: Nikki Frogley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Versatile Dress
items.body: Dress fit very well to size. It was the pretty summer dress to wear to a wedding. It is a extremely comfortable and versatile to wear for work or for a fancy event. The quality of the fabric was great and steamed out any wrinkles pretty quickly! Read more
items.author: Marett Seymour

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Little House on the Prairie look not for me.
items.body: Lovely dress, I had hoped it would look good on me but I just didn’t find the fluttery sleeves very flattering on me. I purchased a MEDIUM in army green and the fit and length was perfect. I’m 5ft 2” with body dimensions: 38/30/38. The length came to my ankles. I think if the neckline were a little lower and came with no flutter sleeves I would have kept it. At least I now know that flutter sleeves that have a girly and “little house on the prairie” look is not for me…. Otherwise it is really cute dress but doesn’t suit me. Read more
items.author: C&C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new summer favorite!!! The perfect dress!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I am hesitant to buy clothing off of Amazon, I haven't had luck in the past. I ordered this based on other reviews and I am SO glad that I did. The color is beautiful, it's nice and airy for summer. I'm 5'3, about 130 lbs and I ordered a small. The fabric is stretchy, so it fits like a glove. Perfect length. I love the freedom in the arms - nice to not be constricted in the hot sweaty summer. I love that this dress hits in all of the right places. It's tighter/stretchy material starts where a high waist jean would start - making my hips look smaller. I love where the skirt starts to flow out, giving that wonderful hourglass shape and drawing the eye away from the belly area. I am wearing this with a thick waist cinch belt, but it looks nice without one as well. I feel like a gold necklace/gold accent belt on this wonderful greenish/blue is just the perfect match! I am also including a photo of what the color looks like in the sun as the lighting in my bathroom isn't great. This dress is absolutely worth it. Probably going to buy a couple more! This review was after 1 wash. I will update if I see any adverse effects from washing in the future, but the material seems strong enough - I would think that I'll have this dress for many years. Read more
items.author: Justine P.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Petite Friendly!
items.body: Oh my word!!!!!!! Petite friendly dress - so comfy and light but not see through. I am 4'11 about 115 pounds and the xs fits me perfectly. Hits me right at the ankles and the top part is not loose like some non-petite clothes. Easy to pair w/ a cute sweater for the office or without due to the cute ruffle cap sleeves. I did get the black color and it is perfect - now which color should I get next?!? OH! One more thing it is a higher neck line which I appreciate for wearing to the office...keep the girls covered haha Read more
items.author: Martha Mezyk

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor stitching for price!
items.body: It’s a beautiful dress, fits perfectly. I’m 5’1 120-125lbs I usually get small in dresses and I did in this one and it fit great. The color seems to be true as well. I am very disappointed in the stitch work based on the price being $50! I feel like there isn’t anything super special about this dress material and I could have bought at Marshalls, TJ Maxx, etc for $25. But I’m in a bind and needed a dress now! The photo provided shows multiple stitch fly aways in one area and there are multiple like that all over the dress, that’s just one area. Read more
items.author: Morgan Kennedy Teston

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great eloping dress
items.body: I eloped in this dress! Super soft! Comfortable! Pockets! Super stretchy! Worth the $ Read more
items.author: Colleen Bischoff

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress. Good quality
items.body: Love it, it's lightweight but not See-Through hugs in all the right places. Very comfortable. My cell phone fits perfectly in the pocket. The color is nice. A lighter tan/cream color not too white. Not too off-white to where it looks dingy. I would have given it five stars if it wouldn't have been for how wrinkled it arrived. It was in a vacuum sealed package. I'm going to steam it. Hopefully get all the wrinkles out that way. I can't imagine ironing it because of the ruffles Read more
items.author: ashnj

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Apricot, Rose, Army Green, Cobalt Blue, Black, Ginger, Coffee, Dusty Blue, Orange, Watermelonred, Peacock, Plum, Royal Blue, Light Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.
